amendment.description: Amendment increases the penalties for those who take a child hostage in order to evade arrest or obstruct justice.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 13 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to increase the penalties for those who take a child hostage in order to evade arrest or obstruct justice.
